alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 4:01AM AKST until January 25 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Total ice accumulation up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Copper River Basin. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Warm air will move into the southern Copper River Basin this morning causing snow to transition to rain or freezing rain. Precipitation from around Glennallen northward to the Alaska Range is expected to fall mainly as snow, possibly mixed with freezing rain at times. The heaviest precipitation for the valley will be this morning, with precipitation then ending during the early afternoon hours. Snow will linger along and near the mountains through the late afternoon hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
